Package com.jmill29.tvtrackerapi.dao

Interface UserWatchHistoryDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserWatchHistoryDaoImpl
public interface UserWatchHistoryDao
Data Access Object interface for managing user watch history in the database.

Provides methods for adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting watch history records for users.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addShowToWatchHistory(UserWatchHistoryRequest userWatchHistoryRequest, String username)
    Adds a show to the user's watch history.
    boolean
    deleteShowFromWatchHistory(String username, int showId)
    Deletes a show from the user's watch history.
    List<UserWatchHistoryResponse>
    getWatchHistoryByUserId(int userId, boolean getAll)
    Retrieves the watch history for a specific user by user ID.
    List<UserWatchHistoryResponse>
    getWatchHistoryByUsername(String username, boolean getAll)
    Retrieves the watch history for a specific user by username.
    boolean
    isShowInWatchHistory(String username, int showId)
    Checks if a show is in the user's watch history.
    boolean
    updateWatchStatus(UserWatchHistoryRequest userWatchHistoryRequest, String username)
    Updates the watch status of a show in the user's watch history.

  • Method Details

    • addShowToWatchHistory

      boolean addShowToWatchHistory(UserWatchHistoryRequest userWatchHistoryRequest, String username) throws SQLException
      Adds a show to the user's watch history.
      Parameters:
      userWatchHistoryRequest - the UserWatchHistoryRequest object containing status and show id
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getWatchHistoryByUserId

      List<UserWatchHistoryResponse> getWatchHistoryByUserId(int userId, boolean getAll) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the watch history for a specific user by user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      getAll - if true, retrieves all shows; if false, only shows with a watch history entry
      Returns:
      a list of UserWatchHistoryResponse objects representing the user's watch history
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • updateWatchStatus

      boolean updateWatchStatus(UserWatchHistoryRequest userWatchHistoryRequest, String username) throws SQLException
      Updates the watch status of a show in the user's watch history.
      Parameters:
      userWatchHistoryRequest - the UserWatchHistoryRequest object containing updated watch status and show id
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • deleteShowFromWatchHistory

      boolean deleteShowFromWatchHistory(String username, int showId) throws SQLException
      Deletes a show from the user's watch history.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      showId - the ID of the show (matches the show_id field)
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • isShowInWatchHistory

      boolean isShowInWatchHistory(String username, int showId) throws SQLException
      Checks if a show is in the user's watch history.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      showId - the ID of the show (matches the show_id field)
      Returns:
      true if the show is in the watch history, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getWatchHistoryByUsername

      List<UserWatchHistoryResponse> getWatchHistoryByUsername(String username, boolean getAll) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the watch history for a specific user by username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      getAll - see getWatchHistoryByUserId(int, boolean) for meaning of getAll
      Returns:
      a list of UserWatchHistoryResponse objects representing the user's watch history
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
